title: Rock Gnome

Darkvision Artificer's Lore

Rock Gnome is a Subrace of Gnome in Baldur's Gate 3. Rock Gnome has the Artificer's Lore that lets them gain bonuses on History checks. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Rock gnomes are the most common to see on Faerûn's surface, named as suich for their hardiness and affinity for metal.

Rock Gnome Traits:

Darkvision: Can see in the dark up to 12 m. Artificer's Lore: Add twice your proficiency bonus to History checks. (this also gives you proficiency in History for free)

Base Racial Speed Gnome Cunning: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.

Rock Gnome Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Rock Gnome race used to feature +2 Intelligence and +1 Constitution. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ??
